channel.title: Hardware on YKM's Corner on the Web
channel.description: Recent content in Hardware on YKM's Corner on the Web

item.title: Review and Teardown of Creative Midi Blaster MB-10 synthesizer
item.description: The Creative Midi Blaster MB-10 recently entered my retro-collection 33 years after its first release in 1993. Seeing that there isn’t much detailed information about this device on the internet, I decided to do a review followed by a teardown of this device. I will also take some sample audio recordings of it.
